EmailTemplate.name: 2014 Customer 4.5 Launch Webinar - 8:00 am.Follow up - Attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the VMTurbo 4.5 Launch Webcast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for attending our v4.5 release webinar last week. We look forward to bringing you more of these types of webinars in the future.
If you were not able to attend the entire session or would like to revisit parts of it, you can watch it here <http://bit.ly/LscRHK>.
We're happy to answer any of your questions: email sales@vmturbo.com or support@vmturbo.com.
Sincerely, The VMTurbo Team Marketo, Inc. 901 Mariners Island Blvd., San Francisco, CA, 94404
Contact Us <#>
